game.shortDescription: .VXE is an adrenaline pumping bullet heaven. Explore a decaying cyberspace as vengeful malware hellbent on escape with the help of a mysterious hacker. Customize your weapons with bullet sequences, upgrade core abilities and stack summons to become the ultimate articulation of vengeance.
